main event: On September 5, 1965, a bright circular object approximately 4400 pounds was observed in Carson City, Nevada, which accelerated vertically into the sky at a high rate of speed.
interesting points: The object exhibited an instantaneous vertical acceleration with no sound reported,It was seen at an elevation of about 70 degrees for approximately 10-15 seconds during daylight,The sighting concluded with no physical evidence found,The report was filed under Project Blue Book, a historical Air Force program,The incident remains classified as 'unidentified' due to lack of additional corroborating evidence.
witness description: The witness described the object as bright and possibly weighing around 4400 pounds, observed during daylight.
